name: Black & White: Darkness & Light
description:
An epic of 12 hours or so developing this game for the QaziJam. Thanks for the good times!

Made 100% live on www.twitch.tv/aurynsky for the Qazijam hosted by QaziTV over at www.twitch.tv/qazitv.

To watch the grueling 12 hours of development you can check it out here - www.youtube.com/aurynskygamesdevelopment.
